title: Brady appeal reaction
itunes:title: Brady appeal reaction
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- react to the league’s decision to uphold Tom Brady’s four-game suspension. The crew also breaks down the impact of Le’Veon Bell’s reduced suspension and Eric Berry’s return. Finally, the guys play a training camp edition of “Go Get My Lunch.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
